What are you thankful for this week?: Je! Unashukuru nini kwa wiki hii?
What are you struggling with and how can: Je! Unapambana na nini na tunawezaje kusaidia?
How did you put into practice the script: Je! Ulitumiaje maandiko/hadithi ambayo tulisoma mara ya mwisho tulipokutana?
Who did you share last week's lesson wit: Je! Ulishiriki somo la wiki iliyopita na iliendaje?
What needs did you meet in the community: Je! Umekidhi mahitaji gani katika jamii wiki iliyopita?
Ask someone to read the passage one para: Uliza mtu asome kifungu kimoja kwa wakati mmoja.
Have a group member tell it in their own: Kuwa na mwanachama wa kikundi aambie kwa maneno yao wenyewe.
Ask the group if they added anything or: Uliza kikundi ikiwa wameongeza chochote au kuacha chochote nje.
When you finish with ALL paragraphs, ask: Unapomaliza na aya zote, muulize mtu kwenye kikundi aambie hadithi nzima kwa kumbukumbu. Acha kikundi kirekebishe makosa yoyote.
What does this passage tell us about God: Je! Kifungu hiki kinatuambia nini juu ya Mungu?
What does this passage tell us about peo: Je! Kifungu hiki kinatuambia nini juu ya watu?
If this passage is true, what behaviour: Ikiwa kifungu hiki ni kweli, ni tabia gani tunapaswa kubadilisha wiki hii?
Who will you tell this story to this wee: Utasema nani hadithi hii kwa wiki hii?
What needs can we meet in the community: Je! Tunaweza kukidhi nini katika jamii wiki hii?
Would you like to discover with your fri: Je! Ungependa kugundua na marafiki wako jinsi Mungu alivyo na jinsi Mungu anataka uishi?
Here are some questions to get your disc: Hapa kuna maswali kadhaa ya kuanza majadiliano yako.
Would you like to discover for yourself: Je! Ungependa kugundua mwenyewe Mungu ni jinsi gani na jinsi Mungu anataka uishi?
Most people like to make these discoveri: Watu wengi wanapenda kufanya uvumbuzi huu katika kikundi na marafiki wao.
